title: Nina
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Nina par Joey Trap
Akachi beats
Yeah, that's my brother right there
Know what I'm sayin'?

[Joey Trap]
Just hopped off a plane
Walking with my chain
I just met your girl
She gon' give me brain
Both wrist got a watch
Benz don't got no top
Bad bitch in the crib
I told her make that pussy pop
Dirty in my cup, this shit is purple, I should clean it
I don't give a fuck I wipe his nose like I'm a Kleenex

Said she counting bread but baby you ain't never seen this
She been off the molly for a week, I think she tweaking

[Z Weezy]
Fuck nigga run up you gone get yo fucking head pop
I come from the gutta, all they fucking know is headshots
Dick all in her stomach, make that motherfucking bed rock
Don't stop yelling, don't stop, I make her legs lock
Cashed out, bitch I'm cashed out, I'ma rich nigga
Fuck nigga, you's a fuck nigga, I can't fuck with ya
Big bands, I got big bands 'cause I'm up now

Bad bitches all these bad bitches tryna fuck now
I don't give a fuck, I got purple in my cup
I'm so high off all these drugs, I'm like, "Fuck it, I'm a thug"
I do not go to the club, I be selling all these drugs
All these bitches on my dick, I don't really give a fuck, bitch

[Joey Trap]
I don't really give a fuck, unless I'm payed
Bad bitches they on me I get laid
I been counting bands up every day
Wait, if I'm with my nina you get sprayed

[Joey Trap]
Just hopped off a plane
Walking with my chain

I just met your girl
She gon' give me brain
Both wrist got a watch
Benz don't got no top
Bad bitch in the crib
I told her make that pussy pop
Dirty in my cup, this shit is purple, I should clean it
I don't give a fuck I wipe his nose like I'm a Kleenex
Said she counting bread but baby you ain't never seen this
She been off the molly for a week, I think she tweaking
